settings.heading: FEEL BETTER FROM THE INSIDE OUT
settings.title: Hormone Replacement Therapy
settings.body: Hormone replacement therapy, more commonly known as HRT, has been primarily used to help menopausal women by balancing estrogen and progesterone levels. Today, HRT is used in a wide variety of ways—for both men and women—to help with anti-aging, reduce unpleasant symptoms in certain health conditions, speed up healing, assist with weight management and muscle growth, and improve muscle functions along with many other overall health benefits.

settings.text: Regaining balance in your hormone levels is imperative for the proper function and optimal health. If you’re experiencing the below symptoms, a consultation at Balanced Aesthetics Medspa will determine if your hormones are out of alignment and the best way to help you regain your equilibrium.

It is important to note the benefits of hormone replacement therapy and testosterone replacement therapy will depend on the individual. HRT often requires adjustments to dosages, which can mean it takes 6 months or more to regain your overall balance and feel better. Once your balance is restored, you’ll feel like your old self, with energy, focus, and control over your body and all its functions. To learn more about HRT, please call our office.

settings.question: Signs and symptoms of low hormone levels
settings.answer:
• Vaginal dryness

• Low libido (low sex drive)

• Loss of bone density

• Joint pain

• Low stamina

• Fatigue

• Irritability/mood swings

• Depression

• Weight gain

• Poor memory

• Inability to focus

• Lack of skin elasticity

• Hot flashes and night sweats

settings.question: What are the Benefits of HRT?
settings.answer:
• Improved muscle function

• Reduced risk of heart failure and heart attacks

• Reduced skin aging

• Reduced mood swings

• Reduced vaginal dryness

• Improved sexual wellness

• Better temperature regulation

• Increased energy and stamina

• Centered mental focus and clarity

settings.question: Testosterone Replacement Therapy for Men
settings.answer:
Men also have hormonal fluctuations that affect their quality of life. Beginning around age 30, testosterone levels in men decrease by an average of 1% every year. Injury, medication, or certain metabolic or inflammatory conditions can also contribute to low testosterone. Typical symptoms include lack of energy, fatigue, difficulty focusing, mood swings, irritability, low sex drive, sexual or erectile dysfunction, and a change in the ratio of muscle to body fat.

Luckily, Testosterone Replacement Therapy (TRT) can reverse many of these symptoms. With a full 6-8 course of treatment at Balanced Aesthetics Medspa, men can experience stronger libido, improved stamina, increased emotional balance, better cholesterol levels, improved stress management and mental clarity, and reduced belly fat.
